---
title: The Train from Spain rides Mainly on the Plane
author: tracey pooh
type: post
date: 2011-04-10

categories:
  - video
aliases: /2011/04/10/the-train-from-spain-rides-mainly-on-the-plane/
---
Kinda fun HD 720p video of my tiny camera taped onto my 3-year-old nephew's matchbox-sized train.

The camera weight and size meant it couldn't go up train hills or tight spaces, so it was a flat track with "elbow room".

<iframe src="https://archive.org/embed/TrainHD" width="854" height="480" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen></iframe>

Choo choo!
